kb3.name: kb3_regions
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_regions` ( `reg_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `reg_name` char(64) NOT NULL, `reg_x` float NOT NULL default '0', `reg_y` float NOT NULL default '0', `reg_z` float NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`reg_id`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
